DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effect of a high calcium breakfast on substrate metabolism during exercise and appetite throughout the day.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of a High Calcium Breakfast on Exercise Metabolism and Appetite
DOC.criteria: Male Aged 1845 years Physically active able to run continuously for 1 h. Smokers Food Allergies Metabolic Disorders Consuming herbal/dietary supplements Gastric Problems
